description.narrative: By 2025, children and women in humanitarian situations and crises are safer and access better quality protection services., which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, children are safer and better protected from violence, abuse, exploitation and harm.
